value.name: I visited Puerto Rico – Here’s what you need to know right now
value.description: Puerto Rico is opening back up after several setbacks during the coronavirus pandemic. I was really excited to learn from my colleague Victoria Walker’s reporting that the island would drop its COVID-19 PCR testing requirement the week I was set to arrive for a work trip for TPG.
